titleStmt.title: The Minster of Cirencester's address to the dissenters of his parish occasion'd by the death of their preacher : together with the answer that was made thereto and his reply to that answer : to which is prefixed a letter relating thereto from the Right Reverend Father in God Edward Lord Bishop of Gloucester.
titleStmt.author: Harrison, Joseph.

titleStmt.title: The Minster of Cirencester's address to the dissenters of his parish occasion'd by the death of their preacher : together with the answer that was made thereto and his reply to that answer : to which is prefixed a letter relating thereto from the Right Reverend Father in God Edward Lord Bishop of Gloucester.
titleStmt.author: Harrison, Joseph.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.M. and are to be sold by Ric. Chiswell and J. Barksdale,

notesStmt.note: "To my well-beloved friends and parishoners who do not frequent the communion of the Church" signed: Joseph Harrison.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
